item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 15, 2025 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:

22. Exo: Exocompilation for productive programming of hardware accelerators (59 points | 15 comments)

24. Show HN: Web Audio Spring-Mass Synthesis (23 points | 3 comments)
25. Google Being Forced to Sell Chrome Is Not Good for the Web (72 points | 75 comments)
26. Rembrandt to Picasso: Five ways to spot a fake masterpiece (20 points | 9 comments)
27. Show HN: Open-Source MCP Server for Context and AI Tools (30 points | 9 comments)
28. It doesn't cost much to improve someone's life (101 points | 91 comments)
29. An Egyptian Temple Reborn (17 points | discuss)
